<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Animal Skin](/Feats.aspx?ID=144) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 90 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[animal instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

Your proficiency in unarmored defense increases to expert. When you are raging and unarmored, your skin transforms into a thick hide. You gain a +2 item bonus to AC (+3 if you have the greater juggernaut class feature). The thickness of your hide gives you a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +3. This item bonus to AC is cumulative with [_armor potency runes_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=278) on your [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2), [_mage armor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=176), and [_bracers of armor_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=416).
